text: Dangshi wo dui zhong tianshen shuo:`Nimen yingdang xiang a dan koutou.'Tamen dou koule tou, dan yi bo lie si chuwai. Ta ben shi jingling, suoyi weibei ta de zhu de mingling. Ta he ta de zisun, shi nimen de choudi, nimen que she wo er yi tamen wei baohu zhe ma? Buyi zhe de daoxingnishi zhen elie!
